author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
created_time: June 05, 2022, 11:43:03 AMLast edit: September 26, 2022, 12:09:30 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: I have a total of 6 wallets for sale. Four are Isla De Puerto Rico total mintage of 50, but only 20 have numbered edge. These are all going to be numbered edge pieces. Numbered edge round are the ones that are already Funded. Unnumbered rounds are DIY or built empty. These are the last ones I own. I will be sold out after these few Puerto Rico rounds are gone. The last two rounds for sale in this post are The Mary Ola's. 150 were minted, but only 50 have numbered edge.   1. Puerto Rico #9 of 20 fully funded with 50 XRP SOLD 2. Puerto Rico #11 of 20 Fully Funded with .001 BTC SOLD 3. Puerto Rico #13 of 20 Fully Funded with 100 Digi byte 4. Puerto Rico #17 of 20 Fully Funded with 100 DOGE  SOLD 5. Mary Ola #9 of 50 Fully Funded with 100 DOGE  6. Mary Ola #11 of 50 Fully Funded with .001 BITCOIN SOLDEach purchase comes with 5 extra holograms incase you want to redeem and rebuild them. Reusable walletsBuy 1 or all for 0.0124 btc eachShipping is $10 USD in USA and add $16 USD for overseasMessage me for my BTC address along with your shipping information. Pay today will ship out Monday morning. They are all 1/2 oz 999 fine silver and will come in coin case. They're counter stamped with CT for Caribbean Treasures, the manufacturer.Now let me see if I can figure this picture insert out. haha

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I would be possibly interested in two of each design - numbers 9 and 11 for both if you still have them.but being a newbie on the forums would only be interested in dealing with you if you are willing to use a forum escrow. LMK
